Visuals¶

Definitions of all visual graph/charts.

class reports.visuals.BarGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define bar graph on binary/multiple choice field.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.BaseGraphChart(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Base graph class. Inherit this class to define new graph definition.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

get_data(entityModel, match_filters, **kwargs)¶

Method to get data for the graph as per the configuration. This is an abstract method and every class inheriting this must override it.

Parameters:
  • entityModel – Class of the actual model from which data has to be extracted.
  • match_filters – JSON dict for match filter
Returns:

JSON data
class reports.visuals.DonutGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define donut chart on binary/multiple choice field (string/int).

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.DotCloudGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define Dot Cloud graph between 3 fields. All dimensions must be number or decimal.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.GraphCharts¶

Enum class to define various graphs & charts.

Guidelines to add new visual:

  • Determine dimension (1D, 2D, 3D, nD) and create ENUM accordingly with the prefix.

  • Add to choices_all.

  • Add to formfield_choice_mapping accordingly.

  • Add graph definition class by inheriting BaseGraphChart.

  • Add newly created class to GRAPH_CLASS_MAPPING.

  • UI:
    • Add switch case in ‘/static/apps/reports/graphs.js’.
    • Add partial in ‘/static/partials/reports/’ directory.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.HistogramGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define histogram on a numeric/decimal field.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.LineAreaGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define line/area graph between two fields.

  • On X-Axis: Date/Time/Datetime/Response date
  • On Y-Axis: Number/Decimal/Rating/Binary/MultipleChoice field
  • Aggregation: Count/Sum/Max/Min/Moving Average
  • Type: Line / Area / Bar (Side-by-Side/Stacked)
  • Multiple Series allowed.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.PieGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define pie chart on binary/multiple choice field (string/int).

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

get_data(entityModel, match_filters, **kwargs)¶

Method to get data for this graph on provided entityModel.

Parameters:
  • entityModel – Class of actual model from which data has to be extracted.
  • match_filters – JSON dict for match filter
Returns:

JSON data:

Format:

[
    {
        "_id": {"answer": "<key>"},
        "count": 46
    },

]

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.PolarAreaGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define Polar Area graph between multiple fields. This graph is applicable on only one response and not between responses.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.RadarGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define Radar Chart between multiple fields for a single response.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.RatingGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define rating metric on rating field.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.ScatterGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define scatter chart between to fields.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.StatsDatetimeGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class to define statistics for date/time/datetime fields. The diagram shows basic aggregates such as Count, Max, Min, across all values of a the field.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

get_data(entityModel, match_filters, **kwargs)¶

Method to get data for this graph on provided entityModel. :param entityModel: Class of actual model from which data has to be extracted. :param match_filters: JSON dict for match filter :param use_string: (Optional) If True, fetches dates as string also. :return: JSON data:

Format:

{
    "count": 42369,
    "min": 103,
    "max": 1698,
}

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class reports.visuals.StatsNumberGraph(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Class for define numeric field statistics. The diagram shows basic aggregates such as Count, Max, Min, Avg, Sum across all values of a numeric/decimal field.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

get_data(entityModel, match_filters, **kwargs)¶

Method to get data for this graph on provided entityModel. :param entityModel: Class of actual model from which data has to be extracted. :param match_filters: JSON dict for match filter :return: JSON data:

Format:

{
    "count": 42369,
    "min": 103,
    "max": 1698,
    "sum": 369756,
    "avg": 561,
    "std": 126
}

Authors: Gagandeep Singh
